description:
Beautiful Daphne Rosen is brand new to MIP, and we slated her with pain pig Mr. Rico for a trip to a stuffy convention. When they return to the motel room that nite, Mr. Rico tries his hand at promoting Miss Rosen to Personal secretary, but she has other ideas.
She first canes him into submission then fucks his ass with a HUGE strap on that makes his dick so hard that she orders him to stroke it off while sitting her gorgeous, round ass on his pathetic face. Mr. Rico is HER bitch now.
title: Your Boss is Your Bitch Now
